data.title: White Pass Ski Area
data.text:
HOURS, LIFTS & TRAIL MAPS

OPERATION PLAN:

During the season, White Pass is open daily (snow/weather conditions permitting including all holidays). Base area lifts run 8:45 am until 4 pm daily. Day Lodge opens for breakfast at 7:15 am; all other skier services are open from 8:00 am until 4 pm.

Paradise Basin, including High Camp, Basin Quad and Couloir Express closes promptly at 3:15 p.m. daily.

Our lifts serve 1402 acres of ski and snowboard terrain.

Nordic Center

Nordic facilities and services are closed for the season. Trails are open for use, but will not be groomed or patrolled.

Alpine Skiing

We will run weekends only through the end of April. We will sell "Limited Op's" tickets on the final weekend.

Tubing Hill

Tubing Hill has closed for the 23/24 season. Thanks for joining us this winter! See you next season!

Night Skiing

Night skiing has concluded for the season. Thank you to everyone who joined us for our night skiing events!
